page.title: 07Local Media Survey: Dalkeith
page.content:
Dalkeith is served by a weekly local newspaper "The Advertiser", which covers all Midlothian. This is a summary of local news from the edition of 23 May 1985.
The main story concerned Dalkeith Palace, owned by the Duke of Buccleuch. ICL, a computer firm had leased the house up until 1984 and a new tenant is being sought who is prepared to pay Â£50,000 per year.
The Local History Society increased its membership from 142 to 176. The Rotary Club undertook a sponsored horse ride in aid of the disabled. The Police and community groups are to organise a display of anti-burglar systems to fight crime.
